abstract: A protocol used to construct map content such as controls, markers, and annotations.

# MapContent

**Protocol**

A protocol used to construct map content such as controls, markers, and annotations.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency protocol MapContent
```

## Accessing the view body

- **body**: The content and behavior of the view.

## Supplying annotation titles

- **annotationTitles(_:)**: Sets the visibility of titles for markers and annotations.
- **annotationSubtitles(_:)**: Sets the visibility of subtitles for markers and annotations.

## Setting the content style

- **foregroundStyle(_:)**: Specifies the shape style used to fill content in drawing map overlays.
- **tint(_:)**: The tint shape style to apply to map content.

## Setting stroke properties

- **stroke(_:lineWidth:)**: Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.
- **stroke(_:style:)**: Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the stroke style you specify.
- **stroke(lineWidth:)**: Applies the given stoke drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.
- **strokeStyle(style:)**: Applies the given stroke style to drawn map overlays.

## Setting the overlay level

- **mapOverlayLevel(level:)**: Specifies the position of overlays relative to other map content.

## Associated types

- **Body**: The content and behavior of the view.

## Displaying place information

- **mapItemDetailSelectionAccessory(_:)**: Specifies the selection accessory to display for the selected map item content.

## Instance Methods

- **tag(_:)**: Sets the unique tag value of this piece of map content.

## Protocols

- **DynamicMapContent**: A  type of view that generates views from an underlying collection of data.
- **MapContentBuilder**: A result builder that creates map content from closures you provide.
- **MapContentView**: A view that contains content that displays on a map at a specific position, and that responds to specific interactions you specify.

## Inherited By

- DynamicMapContent

## Conforming Types

- Annotation
- AnyMapContent
- EmptyMapContent
- MapCircle
- MapPolygon
- MapPolyline
- Marker
- TupleMapContent
- UserAnnotation
